allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Naver Brand Connect automation tools

Features:
- Cafe auto-posting \(cafe_writer.js\)
- Blog auto-posting \(blog_writer.js, app.js\)
- Product link crawler \(link_crawler.js\)
- Portable package support for VM deployment
- Environment-based configuration \(.env\)

ğŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add Gemini AI content generation and portable deployment

- Blog writer: Gemini AI for long-form content \(2500-3500 chars\)
- Cafe writer: Gemini AI with bold formatting \(Ctrl+B\)
- Image validation: Skip error/placeholder images \(<5KB\)
- Smart image sourcing: Follow affiliate links to SmartStore
- Portable deployment scripts for standalone distribution
- Auto product selection from product_links.json

ğŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "C:\\Users\\user\\Desktop\\shopping_connect" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
refactor: Reorganize project structure with Supabase integration

- Reorganize source files into src/ directory structure
  - src/writers: Blog and cafe auto-posting modules
  - src/crawlers: Product link crawler
  - src/analyze: Page analysis tools
  - src/utils: Shared utilities \(templates, image handler\)
  - src/supabase: Database integration layer
- Add setup.bat for one-click portable package installation
- Add .env.sample template for environment configuration
- Add Supabase setup documentation
- Move batch scripts to scripts/ directory
- Update .gitignore to exclude large binary packages

Note: Run setup.bat to download portable runtime \(Node.js + Chromium\)

ğŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "C:\\Users\\user\\Desktop\\shopping_connect" commit -m "fix: Update setup.bat with correct paths and English messages

- Fix installation check path \(packages/node/node.exe\)
- Use English messages to avoid encoding issues
- Update download size info \(324MB\)

ğŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>")

Bash(git -C "C:\\Users\\user\\Desktop\\shopping_connect" commit -m "feat: Add headless mode selection for browser

- Add HEADLESS env var support in blog/cafe writers
- Update START_BLOG.bat and START_CAFE.bat with mode selection prompt
- Users can choose: 1=visible browser, 2=background mode

ğŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>")

Bash(git -C "C:/Users/user/Desktop/shopping_connect" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Treat ''register button not found'' as daily limit reached

- Add setAccountCountToLimit\(\) function to db.js
- Modify writePost\(\) to return ''limit_reached'' status when register button not found
- Handle limit_reached in main loop: set count to limit and exit for blog transition
